channel.title: Hamachi Is Better Then regular servers! (see Reasons Why)
channel.description:
[b]Hamachi Is Better![/b] By Panthers_08
I know half of you are going to say heck know... but just read what i have to say
[b]Positive Things About Hamachi[/b] 1.It has a great Pm (Just Like Aim Or Msn) u can evan use it whan server is offline 2.Easy to Make A Server (NO PORTFORWARDING) 3.Easy To Get Co owner in most servers
[b]Bad things About Hamachi[/b] 1.There Are Viruses -But Thats what firewalls r for if u dont got A fire Wall virus scan once a while- 2.Lagg -Most owners re start client every 30mins to reduce lagg- 3.Alot are Not 24/7 -tell me are u really going to be on 24/7 ? 4.Less People -Hamachi Is Starting to grow =)
If you want hamachi google it at www.google.com and type in Hamachi Then click the very next link below to down load!

So no, it’s fucked.

item.title: Hamachi Is Better Then regular servers! (see Reasons Why)
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“panthers_08, post:4, topic:190489”][quote author=Shogunreaper link=topic=253958.msg2117775#msg2117775 date=1205835197]
Hamachi is shit lol, it lags way to much, most people can port forwar, its really not that hard to learn if you can read, and wtf is with the easy to get co owner in most servers lol?
[/quote]

U dont have to port forwar…[/quote]

Minus well, Hamachi will just do more bad then good.

Read full topic
